data.speaker: Player
data.content: First day of University... It's exciting, this is the start of a new chapter of my life...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I wish I could calm my nerves, I've never even set foot in this building before. Ok... Deep Breath... Where to go first?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: My older brother told me where to go to get started.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I remember I scribbled it down on a note, I just need to read it...

data.speaker: System
data.content:
- Press (E) to open your inventory.
- Find the StickyNotes in the inventory.
- Click the StickyNotes.
